system.notes:
Always Best Quality. All Focus Power Tests and Warp Instability Tests within 30m have -20.
Always Overload 01-05, Force Field only protects against Psychic Powers, Creatures with Daemonic/Warp Instability Traits, and attacks with Warp Weapon Quality.
